settings.title: Take the hassle out of ordering your CBD
settings.text:
✔ Get 20% for life!
✔ Earn SOL Coins on every order
✔ No Obligations - Cancel / Pause / Skip at anytime
✔ Set how often you get your order in one click
✔ Free Shipping for orders over $85

settings.title: Choose your Products
settings.text: All our products come with susbcription options, simply choose the delivery frequency that is best for you before adding to cart.

settings.title: Sit Back & Relax
settings.text: We will automaticaly ship your order to you based on your chosen delivery frequency. No need to do anything on your side!

settings.title: You're In Charge
settings.text: Simply log into your account to update your order frequency, add/remove products or even cancell your subscription - no obligations here.

settings.question_1: How can I manage my subscription
settings.text_1: Simply log into your account or create an account if you don't have one already. Once logged in, click on Manage Subscription.
settings.question_2: What can I update once Im logged into my account
settings.text_2:
As soon as you are logged in and clicked on manage subscription you can do the following:

  • Update products
  • Manage your delivery frequency
  • Update your address
  • View your order history
settings.question_3: What if I want a product delivered at a frequency you dont offer
settings.text_3: Please contact us and we arrange a delivery schedule that suits your needs
settings.text_4: Once you have selected your product and desired frequency, you initial order will go out in 1-2 days Your orders will continue to be placed based on the selected frequency on the date you placed your initial order.
settings.text_5: For all orders over $85, shipping is free. If your order is less than $85, you will be charged $6.95 for shipping.
settings.question_6: Do I earn reward point on subscriptions?
settings.text_6: Absolutely! You earn SOL Coins on both one-time purchase and subscription orders. SOL Coins earned from subscriptions can only be used on non-subscription product purchases so you can use your SOL Coins to test out new products before starting a subscription, or even on gifts for family and friends. We suggest redeeming your points at regular intervals, as they expire 180 days after earning them.
settings.question_7: I have enought of the product, can Pause the subscription?
settings.text_7: You can pause your subscription at anytime from your managment console, all you need to do is log into your account to view it.
settings.question_8: Is there a notice period to cancel my subscription
settings.text_8: Not at all, you can canell at any time from your managment console, all your need to do is log into your account to view it.
settings.question_9: Can I change the frequency of my subscription?
settings.text_9: You can adjust the delivery frequency from your managment console, all your need to do is log into your account to view it.
settings.text_10: Subscription discounts cannot be combined with other discounts, coupons or promotional bulk packs or product bundles, unless epcicially stated in the promotional details.

settings.title: FAQ's
settings.dbtfy_faq_banner_subtitle: Our customer service will be happy to help you.
